branchCategory.name: Rodless Cylinder, MY1H-H*Z, Mechanically Jointed w/ High Load Shock Absorber - Linear Guide
branchCategory.description: <p>The MY1H-H*Z Rodless Cylinders have a one-piece carriage and piston that runs its entire stroke length housed with an inner seal belt to maintain air pressure with an enhanced magnetic dust seal band to protect from contaminants. This design offers a compact footprint compared to rod-style cylinders and features a low profile. The integrated linear guide improves positioning accuracy. Air cushions are standard adjustable with an easy access cushion needle, and external high load shock absorbers are optional. Auto-switch mounting has been enhanced with a face mounting feature.</p>
